# WAACHShelp

[![name status
badge](https://the-kids-biostats.r-universe.dev/badges/:name)](https://the-kids-biostats.r-universe.dev/)
[![WAACHShelp status
badge](https://the-kids-biostats.r-universe.dev/WAACHShelp/badges/version)](https://the-kids-biostats.r-universe.dev/WAACHShelp)
![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/The-Kids-Biostats/WAACHShelp/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)[![Codecov
test
coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/The-Kids-Biostats/WAACHShelp/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/The-Kids-Biostats/WAACHShelp)
[![Lifecycle:
experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/849158197.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17460007)

General helper functions for the WAACHS linked data project.

## Installation instructions

The package can be installed from the R-universe, by:

    install.packages("WAACHShelp", repos = "https://the-kids-biostats.r-universe.dev")

Alternatively, the package can be installed using `remotes`:

    remotes::install_github(repo = "The-Kids-Biostats/WAACHShelp", build_vignettes = TRUE)

## Accessing vignettes

Vignettes have been built for some of the functions. These can be opened
in R or via the [package
website](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/). The vignettes
have the same name as the function.

At the moment, vignettes exist for:

- `icd_morb_flag`
- `create_project`
- `create_markdown`
- `aducust_flag`

Accessing these vignettes can be done two ways:

1.  Using `utils::browseVignettes(package = "WAACHShelp")`
    - Opens vignette via web browser.
2.  Using `vignette(x, package = "WAACHShelp")` where x is the function
    name
    - Opens the vignette in the “Help” tab of RStudio.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`add_rows2()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/add_rows2.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Add rows to labelled data set.

- [`aducust_flag()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/aducust_flag.md)
  : Custodial data flagging function

- [`check_att()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/check_att.md)
  : Education flagging function

- [`create_markdown()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/create_markdown.md)
  : Create Template for Quarto Markdown

- [`create_project()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/create_project.md)
  : Create a new project structure with extensions

- [`icd_dat`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/icd_dat.md)
  : ICD Classification Data set

- [`icd_morb_flag()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/icd_morb_flag.md)
  : ICD flagging function

- [`person_summary()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/person_summary.md)
  : Summarise a dataframe to a person level

- [`proc_contents()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/proc_contents.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Compile metadata from dataframe

- [`proc_freq()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/proc_freq.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : HTML summary table

- [`save_waachs()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/save_waachs.md)
  : Save dataframe

- [`sum_tab()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/sum_tab.md)
  : Summary tabling function

- [`sumfun()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/sumfun.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Summary function reminiscent of Stata's "tabset".

- [`theme_waachs()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/theme_waachs.md)
  : Apply WAACHS theme to ggplot2 plots

- [`transpose_tblsum()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/transpose_tblsum.md)
  :

  WAACHS transpose
  [`gtsummary::tbl_summary`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/tbl_summary.html)
  table

- [`twoway()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/twoway.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : HTML summary table

- [`val_filt()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/val_filt.md)
  : Basic ICD code function

- [`waachs_palette()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/waachs_palette.md)
  : WAACHS colour palette

- [`waachs_table()`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/reference/waachs_table.md)
  : WAACHS table formatting function.

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Flagging aducust records using
  \`aducust_flag\`](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/aducust_flag.md):
- [Creating a blank Quarto markdown
  document](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/create_markdown.md):
- [Creating an R
  project](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/create_project.md):
- [Using \`WAACHShelp::icd_morb_flag\` in
  practice](https://the-kids-biostats.github.io/WAACHShelp/articles/icd_morb_flag.md):
